sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section>
    <connected-view v-slot="data" class="app-main">
      <b-card class="card" header="Status Panel" header-class="card-title">
        <status_panel @subscribeToFields="data.subscribeToFields" @updateData="data.updateChildData"
                      :canUpdate="data.canUpdateChildData" :connected="data.connected"></status_panel>
      </b-card>
      <b-card header="Control Panel" header-class="card-title">
        <Ctrl_panel @subscribeToFields="data.subscribeToFields" @updateData="data.updateChildData"
                    :canUpdate="data.canUpdateChildData" :mqttUtil="data.mqttUtil"></Ctrl_panel>
      </b-card>

      {{data.dataObject}}
    </connected-view>
  </section>
</template>

<script>

import ConnectedView from "@/views/ConnectedView";
import batt_summary from "@/components/Home/Batt_summary.vue";
import batt_detailed from "@/components/Battery/Battery_detailed";
import Status_panel from "@/components/Home/Status_panel";
import Ctrl_panel from "@/components/Home/Ctrl_panel.vue";

export default {
  name: "Home",
  components: {Ctrl_panel, Status_panel: Status_panel, ConnectedView, batt_detailed},
}

</script>

<style scoped>

.app-main{
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 20px;
  margin: 0.5rem;
}

::v-deep(h4) {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

::v-deep(.card-title) {
  text-align: center;
  color: var(--title_color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.card {
  background: var(--primary-dark);
}

</style>
